name: Marketing Systems By Design
tagline: Marketing Consultant for Cleaning Business Owners
description:
Jean and Steve Hanson Â teach clients how to implement marketing systems in their business, using the Duct Tape Marketing System. They provide programs for all budgets, starting with an online video self-study program, to monthly implementation programs.
Companies in the cleaning industry in particular, benefit from the Hanson's 28 years of experience in the cleaning industry, both as building service contractors and consultants. And Jean's love of working with local women business owners extends their reach to the local Minneapolis and St Paul area.
